message: Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'PAINTROID_MEDIA_FILE' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Local final variable name not following naming convention - Name 'QUALITY' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
